synonyms.synonym: Protein upregulated in metastatic prostate cancer

protein.specific_function: Metalloreductase that has the ability to reduce both Fe(3+) to Fe(2+) and Cu(2+) to Cu(1+). Uses NAD(+) as acceptor

reference.reference_text: Korkmaz KS, Elbi C, Korkmaz CG, Loda M, Hager GL, Saatcioglu F: Molecular cloning and characterization of STAMP1, a highly prostate-specific six transmembrane protein that is overexpressed in prostate cancer. J Biol Chem. 2002 Sep 27;277(39):36689-96. Epub 2002 Jul 2.
Porkka KP, Helenius MA, Visakorpi T: Cloning and characterization of a novel six-transmembrane protein STEAP2, expressed in normal and malignant prostate. Lab Invest. 2002 Nov;82(11):1573-82.
